After creating wings out of her paper, Konan uses them to launch a multitude of paper in rapid succession at the target. In the anime, this attack was strong enough to overpower [[Jiraiya]]'s [[Fire Release: Flame Bullet]] technique.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 130</ref>

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the anime and manga, it received different names [[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 3|in]] [[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2|various]] [[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Impact|games]].
